original_text: And Noah awoke from his wine, and knew what his younger son had done unto him.
korean_text: 노아가 술이 깨어 그의 작은 아들이 자기에게 행한 일을 알고

sentences.original_text: And Noah awoke from his wine
and knew what his younger son had done unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 막내 아들이 그에게 무엇을 했는지 알았다
